name: modis_lst_mod11c3_061_day_annual_mean
title: Annual daytime land surface temperature - MODIS v6.1
description: Annual daytime land surface temperature in Kelvins. Created by aggregating (mean) month data from MOD11C3.061 CMG LST product
details: Production of the previous version (V6) Terra MODIS Land Surface Temperature and Emissivity (LST&E) data products was discontinued on November 15, 2022, due to significant loss of data retrieval following the Constellation Exit Maneuvers.

extract_types_info.max: maximum land surface temperature value per unit of analysis
extract_types_info.mean: average land surface temperature value per unit of analysis
extract_types_info.min: minimum land surface temperature value per unit of analysis

extras.citation: Wan, Z., Hook, S., Hulley, G. (2015). MOD11C3 MODIS/Terra Land Surface Temperature/Emissivity Monthly L3 Global 0.05Deg CMG V061 [Data set]. NASA EOSDIS LP DAAC. doi: 10.5067/MODIS/MOD11C3.061
extras.sources_name: Land Processes Distributed Active Archive Center
